text.div:
AllergyIntolerancePatientGivenNameSearchParameter

Parameter patient.given:string

Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?patient.given={givenName}

ResourceAllergyIntolerance
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesAllergyIntolerance
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: AllergyIntolerancePatientGivenNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?patient.given={givenName}
